name: cpair
description: Specific heat of air at constant pressure

name: ps
description: soil pore space = soil water volume at saturation

name: alb_soil_b
description: Soil albedo for direct shortwave radiation

name: alb_soil_d
description: Soil albedo for diffuse shortwave radiation

name: leaf_out
description: Day when leaf emission starts in the spring

name: leaf_full
description: Day when leaf reach max LAI at the end of spring

name: leaf_fall
description: Day when leaf start to fall

name: min_radiation_PAI
description: Min Plant area Index during winter (used as LAI in the radiation transfer)

name: kc25
description: Michaelis Menten Constant for CO2 at 25 <U+00B0>C

name: ko25
description: Michaelis Menten Constant for O2 at 25 <U+00B0>C

name: theta_j
description: Empirical curvature parameter for electron transport rate

name: colim_c3
description: Empirical curvature parameter for C3 co-limitation

name: cpd
description: Specific heat of dry air at constant pressure

name: cpw
description: Specific heat of water vapor at constant pressure

name: MWrat
description: ratio molecular weight of water vapor/dry air

name: q
description: Quartz content as a fraction of the total soil solids

name: Ko
description: Thermal conductivity of other minerals of soil

name: Ksat
description: Thermal conductivity for saturated unfrozen soils

name: K
description: Thermal conduyctivity of soil that varies between dry and saturated values

name: psi.sat
description: -40.5 cm H2O in Bonan book p. 120 converted to Pa

name: SD
description: soil sampling depth/depth of soil layer [m]

name: B.om
description: given by Lett et al. 2000 (in CLM4.5)

name: psi.fc
description: soil water potential at field capacity
